org.red5.server.api
Class Red5

java.lang.Object
  org.red5.server.api.Red5
public class Red5
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for accessing red5 API objects This class uses a thread local, and will be setup by the service invoker The code below shows various uses.

Connection conn = Red5.getConnectionLocal(); Red5 r5 = new Red5(); Scope scope = r5.getScope(); conn = r5.getConnection(); r5 = new Red5(conn); Client client = r5.getClient();

Author:
The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Luke Hubbard (luke@codegent.com)

Red5()
          Create a new Red5 object using the connection local to the current thread A bit of magic that lets you access the red5 scope from anywhere
